summary: Food management is the beginning of the diet.
recentChanges: Apostrophe bug fixed.
comments: It is really simple to use and let's you add all the info you want to. Which most apps don't. However, one thing that is a bit Irish is the drinks and snack sections. Seeing as the snack section has the water and coffee in it, And that's it!!! (No squash, juice, tea...) I presume the drinks section is for alcohol?!? It doesn't really make sense. Either the snack section is for snacks and the drink section for drinks or add a drink tick chart in each section. With breakfast, lunch, dinner...

Simple entry food diary, not for tracking calories. Good for people who eat out and have drinks and want to keep track of those things. I like it just for the purpose of remembering what I consume and being able to look back on the day to reflect on what I need to add to or omit from my diet.

Great app if you want something very simple and clean to log your meals on. No calorie counting. No portions to enter. No searching a database to find the right food.... just type it in and go. Its exactly what I needed to help me log and commit my meals for bright line eating on the go.

Nice and simple... I usually make mine into bullets for easier review (simple enough to do oneself), but I'd love if there were a way to either review or download each day of logs. The app works perfectly for my purposes right now, but if working with a nutritionist or something, being able to send the info for a day, a week, etc would be a huge assist, even if it were just some kind of full-day review screen that I could screen shot. Otherwise, no complaints, aside from the annoying adds😉

I love it! It's so simple. Other apps count down your calories and that makes for anxiety. This just allows you to write anything you want in the notes field. Some days I track veggies, others calories, still others protein. It's so simple and this, so versatile.

title: 12 Weeks To WOW - Fast Weight Loss Programme!
description:
As seen on Channel 4, Daily Mail, Mirror, Express, The Sun, Healthista, Good Housekeeping, Woman, Woman’s Own…

Is being overweight making you unhappy or causing you to have health problems? Would you like to be slimmer without having to follow another miserable diet?  Do you want to look in the mirror feel good about yourself? Well, you’ve come to the right place!  Now you can change your relationship with food, get on track to successful weight loss. Finally you will enjoy losing weight!

Your simple to use ’12 Weeks to Wow’ Weight Loss Collection will help you to achieve your weight loss goals. Choose from sessions to help you get bikini body ready, slip into your Little Black Dress, cut down on sugar or opt for your Virtual Gastric Band or Balloon sessions.  You will find everything you need to help you to overcome whatever is holding you back from losing weight that you no longer want or need including sessions to motivate you to move around more, improve your confidence, overcome binge eating and to stop you from self-sabotaging. Imagine how good you are going feel in just a few short weeks! 

Join our exclusive Facebook Support Group and get unlimited support from other members, app creators and consultants 24/7. 

You can chose to subscribe monthly or to make a one-time payment and have unlimited access forever!  Download your 12 Weeks to Wow Weight Loss collection app and try it out for FREE for 7 days before you decide whether to subscribe monthly or to make that one-time payment.
12 Weeks to Wow offers an auto-renewing subscription option:
£2.99 per month
This price is for UK customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.
Your 12 Weeks to Wow subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play account.  You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google Play account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.
12 Weeks to Wow also offers a Forever subscription which is paid for by a one-off upfront payment of £34.99 with unlimited access to the 12 Weeks to Wow collection forever.
Your Google Play account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription price.
You can manage the subscription and turn it off by opening the Play Store app and going to Menu -> Account -> Subscriptions.

Read more about our terms and conditions here – http://www.12weekstowow.co.uk/12-weeks-to-wow-subscription-app-terms-of-use/
Read more about our privacy policy here - http://www.12weekstowow.co.uk/privacy-policy/.

This application is intended to inform you and enhance your general knowledge in respect of weight loss and eating more healthily and should never be used as a substitute for medical care or advice. You must always seek medical advice for medical conditions and health issues such as eating disorders, depression and low mood. 

If you make the decision to apply any of the information in this application you are taking full responsibility for your actions and we are not responsible for any direct or indirect, punitive, special, incidental or any consequential damages that arise as a direct or indirect result of applying any part of this material which is provided in this application for educational purposes only and is without warranties. 
 
App Features
Powerful Mindful Meditation Sessions that will help you to Lose Weight for good.
•    Over 30 Hypnosis Sessions!
•    12 Weeks to Wow Guidelines.
•    Food Diary to track your food intake.
•    Water Alerts.
•    Progress Chart and photo record.
•    100 Weight Loss Tips.
•   Exclusive Facebook Support Group for 12 Weeks to Wow Weight Loss collection app subscribers only with regular live Q and A sessions.

recentChanges: Fixed the "Craving Crusher" session within VGB
comments: I Love This App!!! It's been a month, and so far I'm down 10 pounds ... almost effortlessly!! The most exciting part however is that for the first time in a long time I don't feel out of control with my eating and weight gain. I have felt powerless for such a long time as my weight kept creeping up and up and having no clue how to stop it, let alone reverse it! It is almost surreal to feel so calm and at ease around food. I can't recommend this app, or this support group, enough! 😊❤

Amazing results, was honestly dubious when I first downloaded the app but have been surprised how wrong I was. Only on week 7 of VGB and have already lost 2 stone without feeling deprived of anything. The only thing I feel needs to be slightly changed is to put more emphasis on the exercise side within the later hypnosis sessions as I feel this has slipped slightly once moving on to session 3 and 4

It's a good app but I'm having problems. Do you have the redownload the hypnosis sessions every night? I often can't actually download them as the download button isn't always there. I've checked WiFi signal and everything there is ok. Is it just me having this issue?

A fantastic app that really does work. I'm now on week 7 and 19lbs lighter and lost over 5 inches of both hips and waist. As it's not a diet, I don't feel deprived of anything I like to eat but have naturally stopped choosing unhealthy food which I never believed possible until now!!! Well worth trying!!

Amazing app. I started listening and following the guidelines 5 weeks ago, and I've since lost 10kg/21lbs. And it's been easy and enjoyable. I highly recommend doing the weeks free trial, you've nothing to lose and everything to gain. After that, the monthly payment seems a very small amount to pay for what you get out if it.

title: Food Trainer
description:
Do you want to eat less unhealthy food? Do you want to lose weight? Then why not try the FoodT app! Download this app and choose 3 types of food/drink you want to consume less of and then play away! Simply press the item on the screen when there’s a green circle and don’t when there’s a red circle.
By playing this game on your phone you will be a part of exciting new scientific research. Each time you play you’ll be contributing to research at The University of Exeter. This app is based on a similar online game, which was shown to reduce users’ food intake and weight after playing the game four times.

The FoodT app will ask you a few questions before and after you play so that our research team can see whether it helps you reduce your food intake, craving and weight. You will also be asked for a few basic details about yourself (age, sex) but the app will not collect any information about your identity. All the data you provide will be anonymous. 
All data from the app will be sent anonymously to our researchers at the University of Exeter and so by downloading the app you consent to this (Check the terms and conditions for more information).

The current version of the app is only available in English. If successful, we will look to translate into other languages. For the latest updates and comments about the app please see our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/foodTapp/

Software Services

recentChanges:
The Food Trainer now collects some anonymous data in order to help us understand usage patterns. This will help us evaluate how people play the game, how often they interrupt playing, if they resume at a later date, and if notifications and customisation are helpful functions for users.
We have also updated the app to address some issues with reminders on phones running the most recent Android versions.
comments: I love the option to change the foods that appear as it provides some diversity of experience. The notifications can be set at a time when you know the app will be most effective (when you are usually hungry) and the activity itself is simple and effective. It feels like a very zen way to train your mind to achieve a healthier body.
Pretty good but there is only one "level". Would be more engaging if it got progressively harder.

wonderful! love this app! it totally helped me to get my eating habits under control. I loved how it gave me my life back. I'm not controlled by cravings and binge eating or by calorie counting and then self loathing. I feel mentally and emotionally better with myself and in control of what I chose to eat. it's my choice again. this app has even helped me managing my depression since food choices were some triggers. very sustainable, wish I could write more as I have so much more to say.
A simple little app that allows you to select foods / drink to work on. Quick and easy to do. I thought nothing was changing, then realised I'd gone right off crisps! Result!
So far I haven't noticed a marked change your n my habits. I am noticing that I am more aware, which is good for some of my food triggering habits. I think continued use might help.

title: Bariatric Meal Timer
description:
This app was born out of necessity. Since I had gastric bypass surgery in July 2017, I've tried a lot of ways to make sure I get as many nutrients as I need. The best way I've personally found is to eat for two minutes, then take a break for two minutes, and repeat this until I can't eat any more. I couldn't find a decent app that could do what I needed, so I decided to make one.

Bariatric Meal Timer plays a short sound effect, vibrates the device briefly, and changes color of on-screen elements, depending on whether it's time to eat or rest. Available intervals for each timer range from thirty seconds, one minute, through five minutes. By default, the timer is set to two minutes.

Features include a themes, the ability to enable or disable sounds and haptics, a night mode, and a summary screen that displays before the timer begins. There are no ads or in-app purchases.

If you love the app and find it useful, please rate it five stars. I will never interrupt your use of the app to ask you to rate it.

recentChanges: This is a pretty small update to comply with updated Google Play policies (and make some additional minor changes).
comments: This is a very helpful app. I have one problem with it. While the 2 minutes setting might have worked for the author, it does not work for me. However, if I change the timings it does not get saved. Every time I launch the app I need to change the timers again. This is a pain. I would love it if the timer settings get saved.

This app is EXCELLENT. Im 2 months post op and wished I had known about this much earlier. It's a must have for pre op life prep. It will be your bff post op when you begin to re learn to eat and chew. This completely stopped my experience with dumping syndrome. Bless you, to its creator. It's user friendly and straight to the point. No extra profile creating and no other extras. just helping you heal, while you eat and chew and rest!!

Really great! Very practical. One thing I would love maybe for a future update is the ability to see the total time for a meal :) I use the app with my partner as a mindful eating practice and we seem to enjoy our food much more this way!

I like this tool. Its user-friendly and you can set the timer for your individual taste. The timer will chime and let you know when to resume eating. Plus, you get the red screen for stop and green to resume. Easy-peasy!
Very good apt really helps you learn how to eat. The only thing stopping me from 5 stars is it would be great if we could set time in 30 second intervals as well.not just in fixed mintues

title: Zero Calories Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast
description:
Intermittent Fasting Tracker. 
Zero Calories - Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast is a very light and simple health and fasting timer app. It allows users to modify fasting time and length of the fast, track body weight, body measures, ketones, glucose and body fat.
Diet assistant 
Zero Calories will help you stay on track, remind you to start your fasting and give you suggestions for improve body weight. There are plenty of features that will motivate you to stay on track.
Intermittent Fasting Plans 
There are more intermittent fasting to choose. Advance, beginner, keto, vegan, muscle builder or other. Zero calories can create a custom fasting plan.
Social Intermittent Fasting 
Join our public groups, chat with other fasters and friends. 
Share each other progress and motivation.

Zero Calories tracks what is happening inside your body white fasting. 
We will teach you how and why your body burns fat. 
Zero Calories is your private health and  diet coach.
You can also use group fasting for fast with your friends.

Fasting is an easy diet that do not require much effort. Just follow the timer and do not consume food in the fasting period (Except the food with zero calories). 

After your fasting is over, feel free to consume any food you like. 
However, healthy whole food is always a better choice then processed fast food. 

Main features:

✔ Track fast time
✔ Edit start time
✔ Edit end time
✔ Track weight
✔ Water Tracker 
✔ BMI Tracker
✔ Widget for track time
✔ Compare weight to fast time
✔ Track body measures
✔  Export data to csv
✔ Set notifications for start fast
✔ Set notifications for end fast
✔ Create custom fast time
✔ Create prolonged fasts (up to 40 days)
✔ Sync data with web
✔ Print fast data and weight loss from web
✔ Track ketones
✔ Track glucose
✔ Track body fat
✔ Fast with friends
Intermittent fasting benefits:

✔ CELL REPAIR

During a fast, your body will rid of waste materials inside the cells and dead cells themselves while repairing and rebuilding new stronger cells. 

✔ LONGEVITY AND DISEASE PREVENTION

Gene expression is something that happens where your body experiences changes in genes, cells and molecules directly related to life span and disease prevention.

✔ INSULIN LEVELS

Fasting can help improve insulin sensitivity, which has been shown to help lose more body fat and/or store less body fat from the food taken in.

✔ GROWTH HORMONE BOOST

This can help to regulate body composition, body fluids, muscle and bone growth, sugar and fat metabolism, and possibly heart function. 

✔ TESTOSTERONE

Fasting has been shown to directly bump levels of testosterone in men.

✔ LOSE WEIGHT

All of the above can already help you lose body fat and drop some pounds. But one of the biggest drivers in intermittent fasting that is leading to weight loss is the fact that it’s easier to adhere to a caloric deficit on a daily basis.

✔ METABOLISM INCREASES

Due to the bodies natural hormonal boosts, insulin improvement and survival mechanisms, your metabolism can actually bump up and become faster due to intermittent fasting. 

✔ STRESS AND INFLAMMATION

Intermittent fasting was shown to help improve oxidative stress and inflammation in the body. 

✔ HEART HEALTHY

Some studies were done showing that intermittent fasting may actually help improve cholesterol, triglycerides, blood pressure, and inflammatory markers.

✔ CANCER PREVENTION

Fasting has been shown to help in the regeneration of cells which could be a possible aid in preventing or helping manage cancer.

✔ GUT HEALTH

Intermittent fasting has been shown to help aid the GI tract in digestion and also protect your gut bacteria, both due to the anti-inflammatory benefits of fasting.

Our Website : https://zerocaloriesfasting.com
descriptionHTML:
Intermittent Fasting Tracker

.
Zero Calories - Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast is a very light and simple health and fasting timer app. It allows users to modify fasting time and length of the fast, track body weight, body measures, ketones, glucose and body fat.

Diet assistant


Zero Calories will help you stay on track, remind you to start your fasting and give you suggestions for improve body weight. There are plenty of features that will motivate you to stay on track.

Intermittent Fasting Plans


There are more intermittent fasting to choose. Advance, beginner, keto, vegan, muscle builder or other. Zero calories can create a custom fasting plan.

Social Intermittent Fasting


Join our public groups, chat with other fasters and friends.
Share each other progress and motivation.

Zero Calories tracks what is happening inside your body white fasting.
We will teach you how and why your body burns fat.
Zero Calories is your private health and diet coach.
You can also use group fasting for fast with your friends.

Fasting is an easy diet that do not require much effort. Just follow the timer and do not consume food in the fasting period (Except the food with zero calories).

After your fasting is over, feel free to consume any food you like.

recentChanges: Fixed premium cloud issue
comments: Postive: Good to track intermittent fasting hours. Keeps you honest and its good to have a visual countdown. You can also set your own personal goal eg 13hrs. Negative: Can be hard to navigate. LOTS of ads, which are frustrating, including asking me to rate the app. My response to your reply (copied below) is: My point is it's frustrating that you can't use the app without responding to your review requests. Your response to my feedback - you ask me to increase my rating of your app to 5 stars. I've now decreased it. Your reply - Hi Carolyn, the ads keep the app free, but you can remove them for a extra small amount (one cup of coffee). Also by rating the app, you help us to acquire more users which can increase our budget for new free cool features :D If you can consider to give us a 5 star review, could be awesome, thanks. My point is it's frustrating that you can't use the app without loads of ads and responding to your review requests. Your response... you ask me to increase my rating of your app to 5stars.

A bit heavy on the ads, but I do expect ads on the free version. Otherwise, this app has everything I've been looking for for fasting tracking. Love that it let's me track all my measurements along with weight. Can measure glucose and ketone levels if I want. I've been fasting for a while and wanted to find an app that would let me enter old fasts. It could be smoother for allowing this, but it does let me edit times and dates for my fasts so I've been able to enter old fasts. Can customize too!

Easy to log info and clear displays. I like the idea of choice of time counting upward or count down. Developer even replied to my previous rating to explain my mistake. Now gave 5 stars as I've tried others and there's more adverts or have to pay. This app is the best in my opinion.

Not a bad fasting app, but the BMI calculator is wrong. I like that you can track body measurements, but it would be nice if they added a female body. Edit to add- my units are all correct. Looking again, it looks like the app IS showing the right number at the top of the screen, but the graph is showing it 6 units higher
It doesn't freeze up and it tells you what your body is suppose to be doing at certain levels. But, I'm not sure how to share this app with other faster. I've tried and I just don't see it.

title: Psychiatry Pro-Diagnosis,Info,Treatment,CBT & DBT
description:
Psychiatry PRO-Project Reach Out is a free Mental Health App that is akin to having your own Personal Psychiatrist & Psychotherapist all rolled up into one and available to you anywhere anytime.Mental health,wellness & well-being made easy & free.

Based on simple questions it can test for Diagnose Mental Health Disorders and then give information about Diseases & Treatment options Pharmacotherapy,Psychotherapy & then also offers Interactive Disorder specific detailed Self-help CBT courses. 

Our Comprehensive App currently offers:-
Diagnostic test of Mental Disorders 
Information 
Psychotherapy-Cognitive Behavior Therapy 
Dialectic Behavior Therapy
Mood & Thought Record Diary 
Suicide Prevention 
Personal Development  
Alcohol Addiction Counselling 
Substance Abuse Counselling 
Quote of the day
Chat
Forums
Anonymous posts
Bibliotherapy 
Nutritional information  

1.Diagnosis
Screening Psychiatric Interview Tests based upon the Diagnostic & Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (DSM-5) similar to a real-world Psychiatric Assessment. This Comprehensive Diagnostic Screening tool currently tests disorders such as Depression,Anxiety disorders,Panic Attacks,Social Anxiety, Phobias, Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD),Post traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD),Body dysmorphia,Eating disorders,Anorexia & Bulimia nervosa, Binging & Purging,Bipolar disorder including Mania & Hypomania,Schizophrenia & Psychosis, Insomnia,Self harm & Suicidality,Borderline or Emotionally Unstable Personality disorder & Antisocial Personality Disorder,Alcohol Addiction & Substance Abuse etc

2.Information 
The App provides a Library of Professional level Information about  Prevalence,Incidence,Pathogenesis,Prognosis & Treatment of Psychiatric Disorders.Knowledge and awareness instill a less negative approach to mental health problems and improves Treatment Outcomes..

3.Psychotherapy 
What you think is,what you feel is,what you do! Thus changing thoughts and behaviors can change how a person is feeling which is basically what Cognitive Behavior Therapy or CBT is,a Talk therapy clinically proven to work & widely used in clinical practice.App also included DBT Dialectical Behavior Therapy specific for Borderline Personality Disorder.

4.Mood & Thought Record Diary 
App includes a Mood & Thought Record Diary which are essentially parts of CBT & help in recognizing Negative Automatic Thoughts and then subsequently changing theses & core-beliefs,behaviors and feelings in-turn.

5.Suicide Prevention 
There is a separate Suicide Prevention section with a worldwide phone and website directory and modules such as distress tolerance and suicide safety planning.

6.Personal Development
CBT based Wellness & Personal Development section with Interactive Self-help Programs based on Cognitive Behavior Therapy with Worksheets and exercises to boost mental health and well-being. This covers topics such as Procrastination, Anger Management, Self-Esteem, Assertiveness, Self-love, Perfectionism and Mindfulness.

7.Alcohol and Substance Abuse Addiction Counselling 
The app includes addiction counselling materials based on CBT Principles and can help users overcome problems with addiction to alcohol or other substances such as illicit drugs.

8.Quote of the day,Chat,Forums,Anonymous posts,Bibliotherapy & Nutrition 
The app includes Features such as Anonymous Problem Posting, Quote of the day,Chat-rooms, Forums,Nutrition & Supplements information,Books to read,Motivational Articles are included.

9.Video e-CBT -Work in progress
Our Trained CBT Therapist is currently working on a Video Series ,which is first of its kind E-CBT series.The videos will be emulating real life Clinical Psychotherapy sessions.

10.Future features-Work in progress  
Team plans to implement One-on-one Video/Audio Psychiatric Consultation with a Psychiatrist, One-on-one Video Psychotherapy sessions & Group Audio Support Sessions With Our Trained CBT Therapist, Psychotherapist & Life-Coach in the near future..

recentChanges: Update
comments: This is an incredible app. I am excited. I often get distressed and use a psychologist's service. Now that I am using this app, I go to my psichologist seldomly. There is so much info in this. It also works great in my phone. Nice
The tests help me understand what people with such mental issues may face, which is interesting. The UI can do with an improvement. I can't read the notice if it is shaking violently!
Great app. Simple and pleasant interface. Clear and convenient functionality. I liked giving you a top five.

Very useful tool for diagnosis and treatment options. User friendly. Clear outline of diagnoses and useful information within each section. Informative for user without an information overload. Good for non medical and medical users. Will recommend to colleagues and patients as an information tool
This is a great and unique app. Easy to use liked the UI. Does anything you would except and more. Recommended.

title: PsyTests
description:
This APP contains psychological tests about several issues that patients often consult to every professional in Psychology. Its content is simple to understand and very useful. You will be able to learn, consult, and evaluate many characteristics about your personality and also if you suffer from anxiety disorders, mood disorders, eating disorders, addiction problems, etc. In addition, there is helpful information about love, related subjects about relationships, about who you are and how your psyche works. 
All the tests of this APP have been developed thanks to the hard work together of a group of Professionals of Psychology. 
Choose a test and start to know more about yourself.

title: Feeleat
description:
Feeleat helps you find a healthy relationship with food by reconnecting you to your body sensations and emotions.
Whether you are suffering from an eating disorders such as anorexia, bulimia, hyperphagia or orthorexi, a digestive disorder such as Irritable Bowel Syndrom, SIBO, food allergies, or if you’re just looking to better manage your relationship with food, our mission is to help you understand your eating behaviors so you can regain a healthy, social and enjoyable relationship with food.
SMART FOOD DIARY
Every day, log your food intakes, and link them to a context (with who ? where ?) and to your bodily sensations and emotions.
As you go along, you will become aware of the contexts that promote your well-being.
PERSONALIZED DIARY
Because what happens between meals is also important, write down your activities and emotions at any time to better understand their impact on your diet. Every evening, take the time to write down your thoughts or your victory !
LIST OF GOALS
List your short and long-term goals and visualize your progress as you you go along.
ACTIVITY FILTER
Easily find an activity or meal that refers to a specific emotion, behaviour or body sensation.
EXPORT YOUR DATA
Select the information you want to share in real time with your family or your therapeutic team.
TIPS AND EXERCISES
Get advice and access to a set of exercises to help you achieve your goals.
RECIPES AND MEAL EXAMPLES
Find examples of complete and balanced meals.
AND ALSO, inspiring quotes to encourage you.
We are already working on improving this version. If you have any suggestions for improvement or questions about the use of feeleat, please do not hesitate to contact us at contact@feeleat.fr
Remember, feeleat is also a large mutual help community.
Join us on social networks and go to the blog to discover the many testimonies of members, their tips for getting better, articles written by doctors, nutrition factsheets, many recipes,...

comments: THIS IS A NO GO FOE YOUR HEALTH. Wrong facts on all topics I have looked at in the app. Sources are random internet forums and non specialized radio channel.

Application ludique et facile à utilisée, je l'ai utilisée quand j'étais perdue dans ma relation avec l'alimentation, puis maintenant que je suis davantage en paix avec cela, elle me permet de prendre du recul et relativiser.

title: TalkLife for Anxiety, Depression & Stress
description:
TalkLife is all about support. Our community is full of people who have also felt alone, battled depression or living with anxiety and needed somewhere safe to talk. TalkLife is a positive community where people have real conversations about how they feel - lonely, misunderstood, unhappy, or actually feeling alright. 

People use TalkLife to seek support for the bad times, but also celebrate the good ones. You, your thoughts, your feelings are important - don't keep them bottled up. You can even vent anonymously. 

You may feel bad now, but you're not alone, and there are better times ahead. TalkLife is here for you through the shiny and the muck, and they can really lift you. Download TalkLife and say hello. 

Download TalkLife and you can safely talk about any struggles and reach support across many areas including, anxiety, self-harm, living with depression, self harm, loneliness, PTSD, bipolar, suicidal thoughts, and many more. 

*Please note, if you are in a crisis situation, please seek emergency support as soon as possible. Peer support should not be used if you are in an emergency situation.

recentChanges:
+ Added the ability to filter groups by topic.
+ Fixed lag loading on public group settings page.
+ Fixed crash on public groups.
+ Fixed notification drop down.
+ Fixed a few bugs & crashes.
comments: I've only been on for a less than an hour and I uninstalled. I can't stand the creepy/inappropriate comments. Honestly made me feel worse. The ads are annoying and the filters are so limited. I want to filter based on country and multiple age groups. I do not like how all the categories are merged together on my feed. I wanted to find a safe space to escape the toxicity on other social media sites and this is just as bad.

For the moment, you can actually converse with people. It's not flooded with bots, OF/IG farmers, or the casual hook-up crowd. There are edgelords, but for the moment.... It's great. Said after spending 10+ hours of near continual usage on the app. Further, in that time the mods/admins were active in discussing community issues, and pending changes in an open posting. Refreshing, and grateful that I stumbled across TalkLife. Keep it secret, keep it safe. ;)

Few things annoy me about it (full page ads every so often, not non stop though but they are hard to exit out of), can't quickly scroll to the top of a page and can't set unique backgrounds for a post. All in all though, a good, helpful app!

I'm using this app for 5 months and it helped me in a lot way, like making friends, taking care of my mental health and helping people. And the new update is so cool. Especially the groups we can moderate our own group and publicize it. So happy to see a community growing and being a part of it.

Im not saying this is a replacement for seeing a psychiatrist. But for peoplelike me sometimes its good to express yourself in a healthy way and receive support. This app honestly helped me stop crying and smile for the first time in a long time.

title: Eat the Rainbow Food Journal
description:
Our App is based on a popular nutritionist recommended diet called "Eating the Rainbow". We've built features following evidence-based research on the benefits of eating a whole-plant based diet to improve health and lose weight.

Our app helps you visualize your diet to ensure you are getting a wide range of nutrients from the food you eat. The kicker? Our app is totally free! We believe that good nutrition should be easy, fun, and accessible to everyone. 

A good guide to consuming a balanced diet is eating a rainbow of plant-based foods every day. The eye-catching colors of fruits and vegetables serve as a good guide for the nutrients they contain. Eating a colorful, varied diet full of plant foods ensures you can access a wide range of nutrients your body needs for good health. 


+ EAT BRIGHTER +
We could all do with more plants in our lives, whether we're vegetarians, vegans, omnivores, or carnivores. Especially the carnivores. So, whether you’re an adult looking to get more fruits and veggies into your day or a parent looking for ways to get your kids excited about nutritious food, our app is for you! 

We believe in keeping it simple. Nutritionists recommend eating a wide variety of plant-based foods to maximize your health. In short, that means:
1/ Eating a bunch of different fruits and vegetables, and
2/ Keeping your meals colorful! 

Choose daily & weekly targets to increase plant variety and access a wide range of nutrients in your foods! Nutritionists recommend targeting 10 different plant foods a day, and a total of 30 weekly. This target includes fruits, vegetables, herbs, nuts, legumes… basically anything from a plant! 


+ FEEL BETTER +  
Plant foods provide a ton of benefits to our health. Eating more fruits & veggies has been linked to lower blood pressure, lower cholesterol, better blood sugar, lower rates of cancer, and weight loss. Go wild in the produce aisle. 

Our app helps you learn the science behind what makes your favorite fruits and vegetables so good for you. Stay tuned while we build nutritionist-approved recommendations into the app to help you explore the foods you eat. In the meantime, check out https://eattherainbow.app for healthy tips!


+ PLAY WITH YOUR FOOD + 
Eat The Rainbow makes healthy food fun! Our food tracker focuses on healthy eating, not weight loss or calorie counting like other nutrition trackers. 

Add the fruits and vegetables you eat to your daily food journal, and let us do the rest! We color-code plant-foods to help you search quickly, and to help you visualize your diet. 

Your rainbow will update dynamically based on which colors you’re eating. The more you eat, the darker the shade. See which colors you're lacking each day and week to help guide your next meal. Think of us as a meal planner with artistic flare.

Unlock unicorn status when you eat the rainbow each day or week. We’ll also give you a gold star when you reach your goals. You’ve earned it. 


+ IN PLANTS WE TRUST + 
We’re two food & tech fanatics, passionate about using technology to make eating more fun. Please get in touch with us to let us know what features you’re keen to see next. Seriously, we don’t bite! (Unless you’re an avocado. We love avocados.) 

Drop us a line at eattherainbowapp@gmail.com 

With love, Laura & Matt

Our app helps you learn the science behind what makes your favorite fruits and vegetables so good for you. Stay tuned while we build nutritionist-approved recommendations into the app to help you explore the foods you eat. In the meantime, check out https://eattherainbow.app for healthy tips!


+ PLAY WITH YOUR FOOD +
Eat The Rainbow makes healthy food fun! Our food tracker focuses on healthy eating, not weight loss or calorie counting like other nutrition trackers.

Add the fruits and vegetables you eat to your daily food journal, and let us do the rest! We color-code plant-foods to help you search quickly, and to help you visualize your diet.

Your rainbow will update dynamically based on which colors you’re eating. The more you eat, the darker the shade. See which colors you're lacking each day and week to help guide your next meal. Think of us as a meal planner with artistic flare.

Unlock unicorn status when you eat the rainbow each day or week. We’ll also give you a gold star when you reach your goals. You’ve earned it.


+ IN PLANTS WE TRUST +
We’re two food & tech fanatics, passionate about using technology to make eating more fun. Please get in touch with us to let us know what features you’re keen to see next. Seriously, we don’t bite! (Unless you’re an avocado. We love avocados.)

Drop us a line at eattherainbowapp@gmail.com

With love, Laura & Matt
summary: Nutritionist recommended food journal for individuals, parents and kids!
recentChanges:
- Ability to add favorite foods quickly
- Cosmetic changes to improve the usability
comments: Great overall! I'm working on eating more regularly and this app is what I'm using to transition away from fully logging every meal. Adding each item and seeing how many or what colors I'm lacking is fun and definitely inspires me to eat more and different plant based foods than I usually do (I struggle with purple, for example, so it's helped me try new ones in that category). I just wish various plant based milks (almond, coconut, etc) were listed, or that you could add your own food items.

I've been using myfitnesspal to track nutrients, but ended up using it in a harmful way, focusing way more on calories than on quality of food. So I switched to this, and I love it so far, really helpful for creating a healthier mindset towards healthy foods and what they can provide. Thank you fue this!
A little slow to get started, but smoother once you have a few 'favorites' logged. Fun way to get kids excited about trying new fruits and veggies. Great tool for adults, too!

Really good app. It's a bit slow and clunky to add foods though. It would be lovely to see some features like being able to quickly add common foods, or see recent foods first in the search, or to multi-add foods. Edit: The update is amazing! The new feature is super handy! Thank you for considering my idea 🤩
I love it! It has really encouraged me to eat a larger variety of fruits/vegetables because it's so fun to try and get the rainbow...lol....surprisingly 😁.

title: Craving To Quit!
description:
Craving To Quit is a 21-day program based on a successful smoking cessation program developed and tested at Yale University. A clinical trial of this program delivered as a group-based in-person training over 4 weeks proved to be twice as effective as the gold standard treatment. 

Craving to Quit provides daily instruction through playlists of audio and video tracks, goal-setting tools, and daily reminders. As you progress through the program, we will walk you down to 0 cigarettes/day by giving you the tools you need to successfully quit smoking – one step at a time. 

PRICING

Craving To Quit® offers an unlimited free trial that includes the first four daily modules. Upgrade in app to access all features and the remaining modules on an auto-renewing subscription basis*:


1 month: $24.99

The premium version also includes in-app coaching from our live coaches to help you stay on track. You'll also get access to our exclusive Craving to Quit community, which is moderated by Dr. Judson Brewer MD PhD - a world expert in mindfulness training for addiction. There you will receive support, weekly tips, can track your progress, and can even ask Dr. Brewer questions directly as you go through the program!

Features include:

-Daily training videos 
-In-app coaching (premium version)
-Community access
-Daily cigarette tracker
-Daily goals and stats
-Daily check-in reminders
-Daily night reflection

*PRICING & TERMS

All prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency.

If you choose to upgrade in app, your Craving To Quit® subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of term and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play account. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renew at any time in your Google Play Account Setting, but refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term.

Need help with the app? Please email ctqsupport@mindsciences.com or go to https://claritasmindsciences.zendesk.com/hc/

TERMS OF SERVICE and PRIVACY POLICY: https://app.cravingtoquit.com/terms

title: Natural Treatments For Anorexia
description:
Natural Treatments For Anorexia | Home Treatments for Eating Disorders

Treatments for an eating disorder depend on many factors. The person’s current situation and the specific eating disorder they’re experiencing usually make up the bulk of any doctor-prescribed plan. Your dedication to getting well and your personal history with eating disorders is also important.

In most cases, your doctor will recommend a combination of treatments, including one-on-on or group counseling, and medications. Some people find alternative treatments as a helpful boost to more traditional therapies that their doctor recommends.

Many people with eating disorders find these treatments helpful in improving their condition. Read on to learn what alternative therapies people have used in their recovery journey.

title: Noom: Health & Weight
description:
Any program can tell you to eat less and move more. 

Noom is different.

Noom’s proven psychology-based approach identifies your deep-rooted thoughts and  triggers, and builds a custom game plan to help you form healthy habits, faster. 

Featured in the New York Times, Women’s Health, Shape, Forbes, ABC and more, we've already helped over 45 million people worldwide build health habits and achieve their health goals. 

People who use Noom lose an average of 18 pounds in just 16 weeks!
78% keep the weight off for over a year. 

Learn how to navigate your environment, challenge your thoughts, master your triggers, and overcome any barrier that might come your way.
Whether it's emotional eating, cravings at mid-day, difficulty with social eating, or a sweet tooth, Noom's scientifically backed-solution will help you create a plan to overcome any obstacle and practice healthier habits until you've mastered them!

What you get: 
- Scientifically-proven psychology approach  to “trick” your body into building healthy habits, faster
- Flexible coaching designed to help you set and achieve your short- and long-term goals, and provide you with as much daily support and accountability you need -- you decide!
- Personalized feedback from your coach based on your in-app activity and progress
- Tools to track your weight, food, exercise, blood pressure, and blood sugar all in one place
- Interactive content with over 250+ new articles, including choose-your-own adventure style guides to apply our #PsychTricks into your daily life, seamlessly 
- Smarter technology to identify your challenges in real time and keep you on track 
- Custom meal + workout Plans available to take your progress to the next level
- Our most comprehensive food database, with over half a million new and updated food logging options and barcodes to make your experience even better
- An award-winning, battery-friendly pedometer to count your steps 

Our team of doctors, psychologists, nutritionists, and personal trainers have created a new course that takes the most effective behavior change research and techniques and delivers them to you in daily bite-size articles and interactive challenges to teach you the skills you need to improve your health. 

Sign up today to turn your healthy thoughts into healthy actions with Noom!

developerAddress:
Noom, Inc.
229 W 28th St, Floor 9,
New York, NY 10001
comments: Noom puts the "fun" in "functional" plus it's easy to use! This app has short, informative articles that always make me chuckle. I lost weight right away during the 14-day trial, now I'm signed up for the next three months! This isn't like any other wellness app... you gotta try it for yourself to see just what I love about Noom. Totally worth it!!

Originally thought I was getting my money's worth. But now they removed their built-in pedometer (which is the only device/app I was using) and they also removed the GPS tracking for when you do a workout and you want to know the distance you went (walk, hike, bike, etc). Very disappointed. I can't even accurately track my exercice anymore with this latest update they did! How am I supposed to figure out the distance I just hiked in order to punch it in manually? Ridiculous update.

I absolutely love Noom! I've never had so much fun and success loosing weight! I love the tracking calories and seeing how many I have left, all the information they give you every day and the fun way they explain it, the coach, the group interaction! This is for me. I'm going to sign up my daughter too. I've only lost 9 pounds so far, but I know I'll stick with it and loose the rest ( unlike other diets) because I'm really enjoying it and learning so much. I love Noom!

I absolutely love this! You learn how to eat better, and eat less. Noom helps you to be accountable for everything from nutrition to fitness! It is also motivational and you have a personal coach to help you along the way. You set realistic long term and short term goals for yourself. One thing that surprised me was I've always been a healthy eater, but with noom I realized I was eating way too dense. So far Ive lost 5 lbs and its the first week! If you put in the work, youll see results!

So far mostly ok. Two main complaints: 1. Step tracking. Originally I set it up to sync with Fitbit and adjust goals daily, but it wasn't working so I tried to remove the link to Fitbit but now it only lets me choose a different app. I just want to log steps manually. 2. Why do they have you add on a meal plan and exercise plan but NOT have those integrated into the app? If I'd known in advance these would be just emailed to me and not really part of the program I wouldn't have gotten them.

title: Weight Loss Hypnosis - Motivation to Lose Weight
description:
Lose weight fast with this powerful weight loss hypnosis app. Want to lose belly fat, but you struggle with finding the motivation to lose weight? Lose Weight Hypnosis is designed to help keep you on track, like your own personal weight loss coach. Get ready to build and maintain your weight loss motivation! You'll awake feeling transformed, empowered and ready to lose weight and keep it off. You have the willpower to lose fat — unlock your own motivation to lose weight!

◎ A single audio session of 22 minutes a day that is effective* in just 1–3 weeks
◎ Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
◎ Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
◎ Hypnotic Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for receiving hypnotic suggestions
◎ Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Hypnotic Booster
◎ Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep
◎ Repeat sessions or loop while you sleep
◎ Continue listening to background sounds after the session ends

If you’ve been having difficulty working up the motivation to lose weight, weight loss hypnosis could be just what you need. This weight loss app is designed to use the power of hypnosis to increase your motivation to lose weight just by listening. Visualize your ideal body and experience powerful suggestions to crave a healthy diet and enjoy regular exercise.

THE BEST WEIGHT LOSS HYPNOSIS APP AVAILABLE

Lose Weight Hypnosis is free to try and effective* with the default settings. A one-time in-app purchase is required only if you wish to change the default settings. (Each of our free hypnosis apps includes its own in-app purchase; in-app purchases cannot be shared among separate apps.)

INTERACT WITH US

Surf City Apps offers a range of hypnosis apps to help you enjoy a healthier, happier, and more abundant life. Tell us how you use our apps to improve your life:

Facebook.com/surfcityapps
Twitter.com/SurfCityApps

CONTACT SUPPORT

http://support.surfcityapps.com

TERMS & CONDITIONS

http://surfcityapps.com/terms

REFERENCES

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binaural_beats

*DISCLAIMER

Results not clinically proven. The content and services provided by this Application are for educational purposes only and are not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Never rely on information on this Application in place of seeking professional medical advice. Consult your doctor before using this Application if you suffer from a heart condition, mood disorder, epilepsy, or a psychiatric or neurological condition.

comments: During to unforeseen reasons, I was alert during the hypnosis part of the session. And when talking about looking in the mirror to see your Skinny Attractive self. It brought my self esteem right down. Skinny doesn't equal Attraction, and I now that it was probably not ment in a derogatory way. However the way that it is worded makes it sound as if the listener will only be attractive once they are skinny. Which isn't great for your customers Self esteem.
I have listened every evening and I think its helping. :)

Only been using it 2 weeks, I have never slept better or fallen asleep as fast as I do now. I have only lost a couple of pounds but I am really enjoying the results so far.it would be great if the home page was not just a bright blue screen with a large "play " symbol
App was working perfectly, upgraded to the booster and loved it. Today the voice is gone and the booster is gone. Only got the voice music. Uninstall and reinstalled and still not working
Is there only 1 audio recording on this?? I paid the £3.99 to unlock it and there is nothing different except the hypnotic booster effect??? Anyone else had the same? Can't even get a refund now ..

title: No Relapse - Get rid of your addictions (No Ads)
description:
Free for life with zero ads 😄

🇮🇳 Made in India 🇮🇳

✔ Easy and simple to use - just tap and start!
✔ Keep track of your progress
✔ Remember your last streak - duration and time
✔ Inspirational quotes, images and posts to keep you motivated - just a swipe away!
✔ Minimal UI with beautiful colors

Overcoming addiction is extremely hard. With No Relapse you can follow your bad habits or addictions and use the app as help to analyze them and beat them. Besides the counting of days, it also features a sobriety clock letting you know the exact hour when you break the habit. Use it for overcoming drug, gambling, junk food and sugar addictions etc.

title: Fastic: Fasting App & Intermittent Fasting Tracker
description:
The Fastic App – One of the most popular Intermittent Fasting Apps

If you’re interested in fat loss, muscle gain or better health, you too can benefit from the holistic lifestyle that is intermittent fasting. We’ve got everything to help you on your way to a healthier life – from a Step Counter, Water Tracker, Fasting Timer and Body Status, to Healthy Recipes and Daily Tips. Follow popular fasting plans for men and women, such as the 16:8 window or the Keto diet and become a Fasting Pro quickly and easily. Start now and download the Fastic intermittent fasting app for free!

🎉 Free of distracting advertising

🥇 Weekly Challenges – Offer a variety of fun tasks to build healthy habits

⏰ Fasting with the Fastic App

• Reach your goals sustainably with IF
• Lose fat, gain muscle or get healthier effortlessly

• Achieve your ideal body type with minimal effort
• Nobel Prize-Winning Intermittent Fasting

🚀 Long-Term Benefits

• Achieve your ideal body type in the most natural and sustainable way

• Strengthen your immune system with your body’s self-healing mechanism

Fast according to your shedule

What are You waiting for?

Start your journey into a new and improved life.

Fastic Plus 3-in-3 Guarantee: www.fastic.com/en/guarantee

Intermittent fasting entails a shift in eating habits. It is not suitable for pregnant/nursing women, children under 18 years of age or persons with diagnosed eating disorders. www.fastic.com/en/disclaimer

recentChanges:
In this update, we have worked on small improvements and some graphics in the app.
We’ve also optimized the loading time so that you can spend more time enjoying Fastic.
Thanks for being a part of the Fastic family!
comments: I am using the paid version and I love it! I love the reminders and the lessons. I especially love the recipes and the fact that you have a TON of vegetarian options. The only reason I rated it 4 stars is that recipes get removed! I plan my meals a week in advance and I went today to prepare one and the 3 of the recipes are gone! There also isn't an option to download a .pdf to save for later. Please fix this and i will rate 5 stars!

Great app. I've experimented with IF in the past, with great success. However, with COVID and working from home, it's a lot easier to slip up and eat whenever you want to. This app pops up periodically reminding me that I need to drink water. It's nice to have a reminder, which should prevent me from mindlessly eating when I'm not scheduled to. My first foray into IF was about 2 years ago, and I lost 85lbs in total. I'm not quite where I was before, but I'm still dealing with about 50 extra lbs. This app is highly recommended, as long as you use it as intended.

Great app, takes a little learning. I was initially confused by the words encouraging me to 'End Fasting' when I was only hours into current fast. This resulted in a few badly timed fast records, but the ability to edit fasting start and end times saved me. I often forget to record my water intake, despite the much appreciated reminders from the app. The retroactive edit ability for water intake does not allow me to click on a day and edit. No response when I try to select a day's water record.

Easy and Convenient app. I love that I can see my progress so easily!! I wish I could connect to my community though. It disappeared as quickly as it appeared???? I also wish I could communicate with my fasting buddies, at minimum send them an emoji or something. I use the paid version so I'm not sure what I'm getting that's any different than the free version... I don't use the recipes or the tools, I just use the trackers. All in all I'm happy I have the app though to stay on track.

Love this app. I'm using the free version. There are enough features to get you started on IF. You enter basic info about yourself & they suggest a plan. You can modify the IF hours. Cool feature shows start/stop times. During fast you can see at a glance how long you've fasted/and time left. Reminders to drink water w/place to log amount. Didn't rate 5 stars because I wear an off brand fitness tracker (not listed on app) so steps are not recorded & no way to manually enter steps taken.

title: PlateJoy
description:
Healthy eating, simplified. Achieve your health & fitness goals with custom-designed meal plans and grocery lists tailored to you.

Personalized meal plans for any lifestyle: Paleo, Gluten Free, Weight Loss, Kid Friendly, Vegetarian, Vegan, Low Carb, Low Fat, Diabetic & Prediabetic, low FODMAP and more.

HOW IT WORKS:
1) Take the lifestyle quiz to tell us how you like to eat. Share your taste preferences, fitness goals, dietary preferences, allergies and schedule. 
2) PlateJoy's algorithms use 50 different data points about you to create an ultra-personalized menu (rather than a one-size-fits-all plan).
3) Get tailor-made meal plans on your schedule, to make healthy eating simple, convenient and delicious. Optional grocery delivery.

summary: Healthy eating, simplified. Custom meal plans designed for your health goals.
developerAddress:
PlateJoy, Inc.
290 Division St., Suite 304
San Francisco, CA 94103
recentChanges: Updated Withings SDK to v4.16 for improved scale connection
comments: I've had a great experience with this app! The food is delicious and easy to cook. I absolutely love the shopping list feature. One thing I would really like is for an actual breakdown of how many grams of food each person should eat. For example, it tells me that I should eat 44% of the food, but we usually use a bit more ingredients than the recipe calls for (ie., Using 2lbs of meat instead of 1.75 lbs). Having an actual weight for the nutrition breakdown would be immensely helpful.

I like this app but it needs some work to make it more user friendly. Like once you make a dish from your weekly menu you should be able to check it off. I love the shopping list and pantry feature, but how about letting me add stuff to the shopping list so that I don't have to have two lists?

So far I am super impressed I am on an elimination diet and suspected to be sensitive to garlic. I listed garlic and garlic salt as an ingredient to avoid. My first experience with the suggested meals at Whole Foods, the kielbasa and substitutes all had garlic salt. I had to put back the ingredients for that meal when I canceled it. I lost time but I also saved a lot of time with the shopping list feature, It's amazing! Please consider integrating with Lose it!

The layout and concept of the meal plans is great. However I accidentally created a meal plan and it won't let me delete it. I can only create a new one but then the ingredients are based off the previous meal plan that was created by accident and I can't reset it. I would contact support but they don't offer in app support?

this is a great plan, for me personally. love the recipes, qiuck, easy and oh ao tasty. I don't stick to it like the bible, but use it as a tool to fit my lifestyle and it helps keep me on track. I'm down a total of 25 lbs in a yr 1/2 . it's definitely a lifestyle change. I totally recommend! Thanks Christine and coaches!

title: Bearable - Symptoms & Mood tracker
description:
✅ All health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your health professional can get the full picture.

✅ Reclaim control over your well-being

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible to all. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.  

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

✅ Gain useful insights with just a few clicks a day

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

✔️ Record your mood and symptoms in seconds, or go into more detail with an additional note. 
✔️ Fully customise your daily activities and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise and medication/supplements. 
✔️ Gain insights into how your daily activities and health factors impact your mood and symptoms using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.
✔️ Keep everything in one place with our neat health timeline, so that you can get the full picture. Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
✔️ Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment - no need to struggle to remember a detailed health timeline for the last week or month.
✔️ Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there’s much more…

➕ Set Reminders - Fully customise your reminders, whether it's a general reminder to make a diary entry or a reminder to take your medication and supplements. 
➕ Share and Export -  Export data securely to yourself or your health professional
➕ Automatic health data sync - You can choose to allow the app to automatically gather data such as Sleep and Steps taken from your phone.
➕ Dark mode - Change at night to a display easier on the eyes.
➕ Restore data across devices - Restore your data between Apple & Android devices.


🔐 PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time.  It’s important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


💟 MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with mental and physical health issues themselves.  With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.  Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most.  We are committed to continue improving upon this app that could help many people start to feel like they can reclaim control over their health.  If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them over to james@bearable.app.  We’d love to hear from you.




Credit to Freepik for icons

comments: This is absolutely the best of its kind. I have never seen such a comprehensive, customizable, well-designed app that serves as many functions as this one. I've already shown it to multiple friends/therapists. For those of you moaning about the cost... seriously, getting the subscription will set you back just over $2/month. I work professionally with highly impoverished individuals who do have to count every penny, but come on. Most people can shell out a couple bucks without harm.

The app lets you log your mood, any symptoms you are having, and a number of factors that you think may be affecting your mood/symptoms. The default categories to log are good, but you can add/remove/edit all of the categories to fit you better. It's super easy to fill out, even when I'm not feeling well. It (sometimes) feels like I'm logging meaningless information, but then when I click on the Insights tab, it shows me tons of relevant information about which factors are influencing my mood (or any other symptom I log!). Turns out listening to music and video chats work wonders for my mood--good to know! This is also a wonderful way to record how I'm feeling over time--it lets me easily decipher long-term changes in my wellbeing, which is great information to discuss with medical professionals.

I really like this app, it's easy to use and the design is nice and the ability to customize it to your needs is great. However, the syncing isn't very reliable. I have a phone and a tablet, and downloaded it on both, I tried to log in on the tablet, and only a few entries were visible. Later I went to look at the one on my phone, and half the entries are gone, and so are factors I added. I want to keep using this app, but if it's going to randomly forget things that's a problem.

I have tried multiple times in the past to find a way that I could easily log my moods in a way that felt nuanced and meaningful but also flexible and customizable, but this is the first app I have ever seen that got it right. For once, I am finding it convenient to do quick check ins and even monitor my food and water intake which I never thought I'd have the patience to do. You don't have to get premium, but it's well worth it at least to support a great app.

Brilliant App & well worth paying for. I wanted an app to record daily symptoms to enable me to give an accurate report to my GP. This app has everything I wanted & more. Being able to write notes by each symptom is so helpful & the insight reports are incredible. I did have a little snag when I first signed up for the free trial, but I made contact, explained the situation & James helped me to sort it all out. The app has been fantastic ever since. Thank you bearable team 🙏🏻🥰

title: CBT Companion: (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy app)
description:
A companion app to learn and practice Cognitive Behavior Therapy (CBT) Techniques.

This is the most comprehensive CBT app that exists today with easy to follow visual tools.

Learn and practice CBT skills using video lessons which helps you to better retain skills.

A growing set of exercises to help you practice your CBT Skills and share the same with your clinician. 

Lessons and exercise have fun illustrations to make the learning enjoyable.

Track your progress on how you are doing and get motivated to obtain new skills. Get awards for tasks done towards obtaining new skills or keeping up with ones you already know.

Intuitive summary to gain insights. 

Over 500 meditations ranging across multiple themes from some of the best teachers in the world.

Clinicians can assign homework (exercises, lessons, meditations etc) using the clinician app and clients can complete and submit them through CBT Companion. 

A true companion in your journey toward changing your thought patterns and living a joyful life.

 Payment will be charged to Playstore Account at confirmation of purchase
*You have a choice of being billed monthly for $9.99/month or a discounted price of $49.99 every six months. 
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy:http://www.cbtcompanion.com/privacy.html
Terms of use: http://www.cbtcompanion.com/terms.html

summary: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Anxiety, Depression, Anger, Stress, OCD, PTSD
recentChanges:
Dear CBTers,

This release is a major upgrade with respect to being able to log your food, physical activity. You can also sync your data from Apple Health and Fitbit. These features are currently in BETA.
Also has a bunch of bug fixes and performance enhancements.
It gives a holistic view of your behavioral health. Hope you enjoy!

Regards.
Swasth Team
comments: I love this app but one of the main paid features does not work. I want to download my entries to send to my therapist but the report output is incorrect. The emotions don't match with the correct day, the time of the entries show only the time you downloaded the report and it doesn't include any of the recorded cognitive dysfunctions I logged. I'm really disappointed and will be checking out other/similar apps and won't be sticking with the paid version after the free trial.

Thus far, I say that this app was perfectly created! So far, what I've seen is very well organized & contains helpful lessons, informational videos, a personal journal, and more! This dovetails nicely with my weekly therapy - I'm feeling ecstatic! I definitely plan to tell my counselor and the members in my Zoom DBT group about this great app!

Could be a good app, but I keep adding entries and they just don't get saved. It is not very intuitive to use, it rather stresses me out. Also a lot of content is not free, and the subscription seems quite expensive.

Is this your app a good one? I've downloaded it about 40 minutes ago but it can't open. Why does it require an email, a username, and a password to open? Meanwhile, there are other expensive psychology apps which do not require these. In any way, I've provided the requirements but the worse part of it is that the verification code can't be sent. I have only wasted my 35mb of data. I didn't know this is a fake app. I thought it was going to help me as a psychology student.

I'm a training child psychiatrist and wanted to test run this before offering it to patients. For now I'd hold off as I don't expect clinically meaningful results. Ideas are taken from cbt but the structure and organization do NOT follow cbt. Was the best available app, but a $15 cbt book on Amazon is still superior in content, organization, and clarity. Pair it w free habit tracker and you're better off. Recent release is dysfunctional. Not easy to navigate. Only anxiety lessons can be found.

title: 12 Step Toolkit - OA Recovery
description:
OA 12 Step Toolkit - Recovery App

This is the only recovery app based on the overeaters anonymous 12 step fellowship that you will ever need to maintain your daily reprieve. It is a perfect companion app for your 12 step program.

* App features a abstinence time calculator which keeps a track of number of days you are abstinent for. Just set your clean date in the counter and it will automatically calculate the length of your abstinence. 

* Also featuring a comprehensive inventory tool which allows you to create your step 4 and your step 10 inventory. You can create different inventories based on the aa big book style - resentment, fear, sex and harms done. 

* Another tool is the night time inventory as suggested in step 11 of the overeaters anonymous program. Ask yourself 10 simple questions, elaborate if necessary and your are done. 

* And the list doesn't end there. You will not need another food diary app or eating journal app again. The Food Journal tool in this app will easily help you write down your notes. Make short notes and edit them as many times as you want. Write down everything you have eaten on a daily basis and track your progress over the weeks. 

* The OA program is not complete with the gratitude list tool. This pro tool will let you write down the things you are grateful for. 

* Worried about others checking your personal notes? We have taken care of that too by giving you an extra layer of security with Pin Locking. 

* The overeaters anonymous program is all about sharing with others and hence a lovely feature has been added for sharing your inventories, journal and gratitude lists via Facebook, Twitter, email, texts, WhatsApp and more. 

In short, if you are a recovering addict and need a 12 step companion you can carry in your pocket, especially if you don't have a sponsor yet, this tool will go a long way in recovery. 

The Just For Today card comes as standard with the free version of this app. 

We have also added some more literature which can be useful in conducting an OA meeting or just as helpful when read in solitude. This in fact is your bible for recovering from food overeating addiction.


Prayers included:

- Serenity Prayer
- Third Step Prayer
- Seventh Step Prayer
- Eleventh Step Prayer
- The Lord's Prayer

Readings included:

- Our invitation to you 
- 12 Traditions
- OA Tools
- OA Readings


This App is not affiliated to, endorsed by or sponsored by any 12 step fellowship including but not limited to Overeaters Anonymous.

For any suggestions or problems, please email me directly on ibyteapps@gmail.com

If you cannot afford the pro features in this app, please get in touch and I'll provide you a discounted version of it.

Visit our website for more information: http://www.12steptoolkit.com

summary: Overeaters Anonymous App- 10th step & 11th step inventory, gratitude list & more
comments: Love this AP. Useful adjunct to working my OA program. Especially beneficial for me is the OA TOOLKIT. With my wild mind and Attention Deficit it enables to find my journal. Might sound simple buy to me BIG ASSET. Sharing inventory, gratitude list and journal, WHEN APPROPRIATE, also has helped me grow through feedback from sponsor.

I would rate the app 5 stars if there was a separate tab where I could record my daily Plan of Eating and Action Plan. And if I could access the daily readings from For Today and Voices of Recovery from the app... and I am willing to pay for that option as I know there are copyright laws to consider... but then you could pay the same as you would when buying the literature from OA.
Worked well for a few weeks not working now won't allow use of night time inventory. Actually no part of is working. I had bought it.
All the readings are in one place that makes it convenient.
The app stopped working. I can't find a way to report it, get it repaired.

title: NanoCurso Anorexia y Bulimia
description:
Esta app presenta información sobre la anorexia y bulimia nerviosa, de una forma clara y rigurosa, ofrecida por profesionales especialistas en este problema de salud. En esta app se explica de forma precisa en qué consisten estos problemas y sus características principales, así como se exponen sus causas y consecuencias físicas, psicológicas y sociales. Incluye una amplia descripción sobre los diferentes tratamientos que se pueden seguir, así se explica en qué consiste el tratamiento farmacológico, y el funcionamiento y características de los dispositivos asistenciales a los que se pueden acudir, como son el ingreso en una unidad hospitalaria especializada y en un centro de día.

Esta app describe las señales a las que se debe estar atento para saber si se está desarrollando un trastorno de la conducta alimentaria, como la anorexia o la bulimia. En este caso, también se indica qué se debe hacer y dónde acudir. También se dan algunos consejos sobre qué hacer en el caso de que la persona que sufre el problema no quiera buscar ayuda especializada. Además, se incluye la dirección de asociaciones para familiares y de otros recursos de interés.

Esta app no olvida otros trastornos alimentarios que por ser menos conocidos no menos importantes, como es el caso de la pica, la rumiación, el trastorno de evitación de la ingesta de alimentos, el trastorno de atracones y los trastornos de la conducta alimentaria no especificados, de los que se realiza una descripción detallada de cada uno de ellos. Además, dedica un nanocurso a la vigorexia, en el que se explican las diferentes características que la definen y se presenta información sobre los índices de prevalencia de este problema, así como de los factores de riesgo que pueden conducir a su desarrollo.

Se dedica un nanocurso a la importancia que tiene la imagen corporal en el desarrollo personal del individuo. Trata de dar una explicación a por qué el sentimiento que tienen las personas con un trastorno alimentario respecto a su cuerpo es rechazo, asco y/o  insatisfacción, resaltando el papel influyente que tiene nuestra cultura.
Esta aplicación destaca el importante papel que tienen las familias tanto en la prevención, como en el tratamiento en estos problemas. Así, por ejemplo, se indican una serie de pautas y recomendaciones que los familiares pueden seguir para prevenir la aparición de estos trastornos y, en el caso de que ya exista un familiar afectado, se explican los mecanismos a través de los cuales la familia puede tener una influencia positiva en su recuperación.
descriptionHTML:
Esta app presenta información sobre la anorexia y bulimia nerviosa, de una forma clara y rigurosa, ofrecida por profesionales especialistas en este problema de salud. En esta app se explica de forma precisa en qué consisten estos problemas y sus características principales, así como se exponen sus causas y consecuencias físicas, psicológicas y sociales. Incluye una amplia descripción sobre los diferentes tratamientos que se pueden seguir, así se explica en qué consiste el tratamiento farmacológico, y el funcionamiento y características de los dispositivos asistenciales a los que se pueden acudir, como son el ingreso en una unidad hospitalaria especializada y en un centro de día.

Esta app describe las señales a las que se debe estar atento para saber si se está desarrollando un trastorno de la conducta alimentaria, como la anorexia o la bulimia. En este caso, también se indica qué se debe hacer y dónde acudir. También se dan algunos consejos sobre qué hacer en el caso de que la persona que sufre el problema no quiera buscar ayuda especializada. Además, se incluye la dirección de asociaciones para familiares y de otros recursos de interés.

Esta app no olvida otros trastornos alimentarios que por ser menos conocidos no menos importantes, como es el caso de la pica, la rumiación, el trastorno de evitación de la ingesta de alimentos, el trastorno de atracones y los trastornos de la conducta alimentaria no especificados, de los que se realiza una descripción detallada de cada uno de ellos. Además, dedica un nanocurso a la vigorexia, en el que se explican las diferentes características que la definen y se presenta información sobre los índices de prevalencia de este problema, así como de los factores de riesgo que pueden conducir a su desarrollo.

Se dedica un nanocurso a la importancia que tiene la imagen corporal en el desarrollo personal del individuo. Trata de dar una explicación a por qué el sentimiento que tienen las personas con un trastorno alimentario respecto a su cuerpo es rechazo, asco y/o insatisfacción, resaltando el papel influyente que tiene nuestra cultura.
Esta aplicación destaca el importante papel que tienen las familias tanto en la prevención, como en el tratamiento en estos problemas. Así, por ejemplo, se indican una serie de pautas y recomendaciones que los familiares pueden seguir para prevenir la aparición de estos trastornos y, en el caso de que ya exista un familiar afectado, se explican los mecanismos a través de los cuales la familia puede tener una influencia positiva en su recuperación.
summary: Nanocurso with clear and accurate information on anorexia and bulimia nervosa
